column1: in memory of carol green webster -- rinehart and sons funeral home inc.| carol green webster. december 2
column8: 2015 after an extended illness. the wayne county
column9: ga. native had lived in brunswick
column10: ga. most of her adult life and was a retired professional housecleaner. she loved writing poetry
column11: antiquing and fishing. she was predeceased by a daughter
column14: jeanette griffis and joyce jones; brothers
column16: brantley eugene green. survivors are two sons and a daughter-in-law
column25: ouida and vernon drury of jesup
column30: martha and revis wasdin of screven
column31: ga.; several nieces and nephews. graveside funeral services will be 10 a. m. wednesday
column33: 2015 at screven city cemetery with rev. revis wasdin officiating. visitation will be 5 to 7 p. m. tuesday
column35: 2015 at rinehart and sons funeral home
column38: ga. 31546. please sign the online guestbook at www. rinehartandsons. com. rinehart and sons funeral home of jesup
column39: ga. is in charge of arrangements.
